name: Imposter Clash 3D
description:
- An epic encounter is about to take place and you are the main character.
- Not just running and gathering the crowd, you are also transformed into a mysterious character to lead the crowd.
- All you need to do is collect your army to overcome all the traps along the way and go to the monster's castle to defeat them, save the world.
- Are you a good leader? See how many armies you have left over all obstacles, electric fences, landslides and thorny tunnels. It's really not easy to get through and your army numbers are still the same, but keep your army as high as possible.
- Another equally difficult task that you need to perform is to keep your castle as epic as possible and destroy as many enemy castles as possible, then you will receive a lot of items.
HOW TO PLAY
- Collect crowds
- Overcome obstacles
- Destroy the monsters
- Shoot down the enemy's castle
- Collect lots of gold and guns
Do you think you are brave enough to lead the crowd through all these obstacles? Download the game to test your luck today.
